article_title: In India, IBM's Watson Will Aid Cancer Care Where Doctors Are Scarce

article_metadata.description: IBM and a large hospital system in India have partnered to diagnose and treat cancer care in a country of 1.2 billion residents who often cannot access oncologists, leaving their diseases undetected and untreated. IBM’s Watson artificial intelligence system will be used by Manipal Hospitals’ 16 health facilities and affiliated academic [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
